Posts.EditableText:
The mystery surrounding the murder of Jerimiah Quill, the Magistrate. He’s missing his head, poor chap?!  
Woodsbane calls in another Magistrate to solve his murder. This is you!

The answers can be found by looking at the [b:2i0ut4wj][u:2i0ut4wj]ANSWERS[/u:2i0ut4wj][/b:2i0ut4wj] table and matching the number to the word to build up the sentence.

[u:2i0ut4wj][b:2i0ut4wj]QUESTIONS[/b:2i0ut4wj][/u:2i0ut4wj]
Q1) What do I do first?
A1) 34 10 87
Q2) What’s the deal with the laundry basket?
A2) 14 67 3 6 99
Q3) Now what?
A3) 1 17 6 35 76 81 41
Q4) What’s in the sewers?
A4) 2 72 76 96 
Q5) How do I escape the tentacles?
A5) 11 64 80 42
Q6) Where’s the key to the tower?
A6) 18 39 4 20
Q7) How do I get Robu the Clown to talk?
A7) 24 75 80 84 48
Q8) Where did Robu say to look?
A8) 1 69 32
Q9) What do I do with the necklace?
A9) 24 10 91 76 61
Q10) What do I do with the crows?
A10) 15 31
Q11) It’s too dark down in the dungeon.
A11) 21 2 40
Q12) Which key opens the casket?
A12) 55 7 55
Q13) How do I pay the Puppet Master?
A13) 51 6 12
Q14) What does Gugan’s vision mean?
A14) 8 10 6 25 76 52 68 50 110 40
Q15) What do I do with the puppet?
A15) 5 9 33. 97 5 50 2 43
Q16) The map model in the tower, what gives?
A16) 19 26 18 84
Q17) The Necromancer scarpered, what now?
A17) 34 10 77, 82 16 70
Q18) Been everywhere, talked to everybody, I’m stuck?
A18) 98 27 13 28 88 71 29 22 65
Q19) Details, please?
A19)
[list:2i0ut4wj]i) 34 10 30
ii) 34 10 91
iii) 36 6 62 83
iv) 24 37 10 61
v) 24 37 10 91
vi) 34 10 38 53
vii) 24 44 6 75 10 85
viii) 34 10 46[/list:u:2i0ut4wj]
Q20) How do I stop the Headless Huntsman?
A21) 47 74 89, 49 5 4 74 54
Q22) How long have I got before the chop?
A22) 45 66
Q23) Where’s his grave?
A23) 63 86 6 78
Q24) What???
A24) 56 60 4 73 57. 19 59 50 79
Q25) Where’s the skull?
A25) 34 10 58.
Q26) She talks about a “lifestone”?
A26) 100 6 90. 97 5 50 101
Q27) Where is it?
A27) 4 92 50 95. 23 6 102 93. 36 6 103. 19 94 18 104
Q28) What do I do last?
A28) 108 6 107 4 106
Q29) I’ve just been killed. What did I forget to do?
A29) 105 6 109 – 98 109

[b:2i0ut4wj][u:2i0ut4wj]ANSWERS[/u:2i0ut4wj][/b:2i0ut4wj]
1 LOOK
2 A
3 OF
4 IN
5 IT
6 THE
7 FOR
8 GO
9 IS
10 TO
11 THROW
12 CUSHION
13 WILL
14 PUSH
15 SCARE
16 IF
17 AT
18 ON
19 USE
20 SEWERS
21 LIGHT
22 ARE
23 KEEP
24 GIVE
25 WINDMILL
26 LODESTONE
27 GHOST
28 APPEAR
29 CLUES
30 GRUNE
31 THEM
32 STONE
33 FRAGILE
34 SPEAK
35 WALL
36 READ
37 NECKLACE
38 BROTHER
39 ALTAR
40 CANDLE
41 BRICKS
42 BARGE
43 TOOL
44 ROBU
45 THIRTY
46 TYMUS
47 FIND
48 KITCHEN
49 PUT
50 WITH
51 CUT
52 BURN
53 RAPHAEL
54 GRAVE
55 SILVER
56 MOVE
57 CHAMBER
58 GRETCH
59 PAPER
60 STATUE
61 ZIMM
62 LOVE
63 X
64 NET
65 FOUND
66 MOVES
67 OUT
68 CLOTH
69 UNDER
70 NECESSARY
71 EIGHT
72 SHOVEL
73 ITS
74 HIS
75 WINE
76 AND
77 JACOB
78 SPOT
79 MAP
80 FROM
81 PULL
82 TWICE
83 LETTER
84 TOWER
85 CONFESS
86 MARKS
87 EVERYBODY
88 WHEN
89 SKULL
90 PUPPET
91 ATTICUS
92 CRYPT
93 HANDY
94 PIN
95 VAMPIRE
96 TENTACLES
97 BREAK
98 ESMRIE’S
99 WAY
100 REMEMBER
101 HAMMER
102 CRUCIFIX
103 PARCHMENT
104 KATARINA
105 DESTROY
106 TEMPLE
107 CULPRIT
108 ARREST
109 ROSE
110 LIT
